name: Robot 1 in... The Ship of Doom
overview: Robot 1 has been left behind by the crew who have abandoned the ship which is on a collision course with the nearby sun! Robot 1 needs to gather together the 4 teleport keys and then find the teleport pad to escape. You have 5 minutes before things start getting toasty. Keep an eye on your battery meter, if it gets too low, you'll need to find a recharge socket. There are many data keys to collect around the ship which adds to your score as well.
